name: Spiky World by Vitoco
description:
Spiky World

(c) 2022 by Victor Parada

You are a bubble in a spiky world,

but other bubbles want to chase you.

Guide them to the green spikes.

Game written for NOMAM's

10-liners BASIC Contest 2022.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- Atari BASIC ROM

- Joystick

Load instructions:

- Boot SPIKY.ATR disk

- Wait for READY prompt

- Type: E."D:SPIKY.LST"

- Wait for READY prompt

- Type: RUN

- Play the game

- Press the button to restart

Game instructions:

- Use the joystick to move the

  orange bubble.

- Everything kills you.

- Purple bubbles will follow you.

- Guide them to the green spikes.

- Complete 5 rounds to win and

  see the score.

https://www.vitoco.cl/atari/10liner/
